dcterms:creator: S. Song
P. J. Sjöström
M. Reigl

D. B. Chklovskii
dcterms:description: Connectivity of layer 5 pyramidal neurons in the rat visual cortex was shown to have a significantly stronger reciprocity than expected.
dcterms:title: Connectivity of layer 5 pyramidal neurons in the rat visual cortex

dcterms:creator: R. Perin
T. K. Berger
H. Markram
dcterms:description: Connectivity of layer 5 pyramidal neurons in the rat somatosensory cortex was shown to have a significantly stronger reciprocity than expected.
dcterms:title: Connectivity of layer 5 pyramidal neurons in the rat somatosensory cortex

dcterms:creator: S. Lefort
C. Tomm
J. C. Floyd Sarria
C. C. H. Petersen
dcterms:description: Intra-layer connectivity of the mouse C2 barrel column was analyzed to understand the excitatory neuronal network.
dcterms:title: Intra-layer connectivity of the mouse C2 barrel column

dcterms:creator: A. M. Thomson
D. C. West
Y. Wang
A. P. Bannister
dcterms:description: Connectivity statistics in local cortical networks involving excitatory and inhibitory neurons were analyzed through triple intracellular recordings.
dcterms:title: Connectivity statistics in local cortical networks

dcterms:creator: W.-C. A. Lee
V. Bonin
M. Reed
B. J. Graham
G. Hood
dcterms:description: Connection probabilities in visual cortex as a function of neurons’ absolute difference in orientation preference were reported.
dcterms:title: Connection probabilities in visual cortex as a function of neurons’ absolute difference in orientation preference
